chunks.chunk_text: Hi there,歡迎收聽Look Back Sunday回顧星期天在這個節目,John老師會彙整過去不同國家以及主題的熱門更多文章讓你可以在15分鐘內吸收最精華的世界時事趣聞Let's get started!
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 小吃零食相關時事趣聞 All about snacks.json

chunks.chunk_text: The worst offending Chinese takeaway dishes in a survey published on March 13th by Action on Salt were found to have as much salt as five McDonald's Big Macs while many had more than half an adult's entire daily allowance.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 小吃零食相關時事趣聞 All about snacks.json

chunks.chunk_text: Supermarket Chinese ready meals were also laden with salt, with some containing more than the amount found in two Pizza Express Margarita pizzas, the report reveals. Some rice dishes contained more salt than 11 bags of ready salted crisps.Action on Salt is leading a group of health experts in calling on Public Health England to set tough new salt targets.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 小吃零食相關時事趣聞 All about snacks.json

chunks.chunk_text: Make front of pack labeling mandatory and to follow New York's lead by requiring chains to put warning labels on high salt dishes.They are also urging the food industry and restaurants to reduce salt by reformulating takeaways and ready meals.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 小吃零食相關時事趣聞 All about snacks.json
RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 小吃零食相關時事趣聞 All about snacks.json

chunks.chunk_text: of Mary University of London.Reducing salt is the most cost-effective measure to reduce the number of people dying or suffering from strokes or heart disease.Accompanying rice dishes, spring rolls and prawn crackers and soy sauce can pile on the salt in a Chinese meal.Dishes from six Chinese restaurants were also analyzed, with 97% found to contain two grams of salt or more.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 小吃零食相關時事趣聞 All about snacks.json

chunks.chunk_text: More than half, 58%, contained in excess of three grams of salt per dish, half an adult's maximum recommended daily intake.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 小吃零食相關時事趣聞 All about snacks.json

chunks.chunk_text: The Taiwan Food and Drug Administration, TFDA, says that the storage in a sealed bag filled with nitrogen is necessary to keep the chips fresh and tasty.The TFDA shared a post on its Facebook page and an article on its website in which it said that potato chips are fried at a high temperature during the manufacturing process, and when they come into contact with air, they can easily become oxidized.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 小吃零食相關時事趣聞 All about snacks.json

chunks.chunk_text: which would tend to make them turn soft and crumble, and can even make them smell and taste rancid.The TFDA explained that a sealed bag can prevent the chips from coming into contact with air, thus reducing oxidation and extending their shelf life.This is done by sealing them inside a plastic bag lined with a compound material such as tinfoil or aluminum foil, as well as keeping the chips
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 小吃零食相關時事趣聞 All about snacks.json

chunks.chunk_text: out of contamination by things like air, grease, damp and microbes.It can also help to prevent light exposure and reduce oxidation.The TFDA says that the food manufacturers pump the bags full of nitrogen to prevent the chips from being damaged and broken by knocking or crushing during transportation.Nitrogen is chemically stable and does not easily react with other substances.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 小吃零食相關時事趣聞 All about snacks.json

chunks.chunk_text: It is the most plentiful gas in the Earth's atmosphere, comprising 78.09% of its total volume, which makes it easy and cheap to obtain.Nitrogen flushing technology can therefore be used to ensure the quality and safety of potato chips, making them look wholesome and taste good, as well as keeping them free from contamination by bacteria or other microbes.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 小吃零食相關時事趣聞 All about snacks.json

chunks.chunk_text: Next article.Taiwanese cakes take London by storm.Taiwanese food has taken many countries by storm in recent years, such as bubble milk tea.Recently, the US online media insider shared a video of the making of Taiwanese cakes on its official Twitter account, drawing much attention from social media users.Food insider, a popular food channel, posted a video on December 26th
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 小吃零食相關時事趣聞 All about snacks.json

chunks.chunk_text: introducing a shop called Wheelcake Island in London.The tweet reads,

chunks.chunk_text: Taiwanese people commented,I would love to make them, while another said,Yummy!
